thread.title: Katy Perry's BRIT Awards Back-Up Dancer, Dressed As a House, Tumbles Off Stage -- See the Best Fan Reactions!
thread.title_full: Katy Perry's BRIT Awards Back-Up Dancer, Dressed As a House, Tumbles Off Stage -- See the Best Fan Reactions!

author: Desiree Murphy
title: Katy Perry's BRIT Awards Back-Up Dancer, Dressed As a House, Tumbles Off Stage -- See the Best Fan Reactions!
text: Katy Perry's BRIT Awards Back-Up Dancer, Dressed As a House, Tumbles Off Stage -- See the Best Fan Reactions! by Desiree Murphy 4:30   Photo: Getty Images Is "House Dancer" the new " Left Shark ?" Katy Perry wowed the crowd at the BRIT Awards at the O2 Arena in London, England, on Wednesday, performing her new hit, "Chained to the Rhythm," with Skip Marley. Although her performance appeared flawless, some fans caught a glimpse of an onstage oops by one of her backup dancers. Naturally, they took to Twitter to comment on the hilarious choreography misstep. WATCH: Katy Perry's Exes React to Her Super Bowl Halftime Show Performance Much like her Super Bowl XLIX halftime show , one of Perry's dancers stole the show. But this time it wasn't someone dressed as a shark -- they were dressed as a giant white house. "Katy Perry's backing dancer falling off stage," wrote one KatyCat, fittingly accompanying her tweet with the crying face emoji. "Oh I am weak, this is left shark all over again." Katy Perry's backing dancer falling off stage üòÇüòÇüòÇ oh I am weak, this is left shark all over again Another chimed in, tweeting, "I am crying the House fell off the stage."
